resources.string: You have marked your life for
This app is called Non-Contribution Graph, which is inspired by the Contribution Graph used in VCS tools like GitHub.
But you don\'t contribute on anything over here!
It\'s for you to record your daily activities on both frequency and intensity. Click on a grid and use color bars with action buttons to manipulate it!

Four kinds of activity are built-in for you. Four different colors are associated with these activities. Different color intensities in a grid indicate different levels of the activity within a day. One intensity level represents a half hour of doing corresponding activity.
A report is provided for you to check the stats of these activities in this month!
